sentences.en: Only the president could authorize the use of the atomic bomb.
sentences.cn: 只有总统能授权原子弹的使用。

sentences.en: It would certainly be within his power to authorize a police raid like that.
sentences.cn: 他肯定有权批准那种警方突袭行动。

sentences.en: The Wilderness Society lobbied Congress to authorize the Endangered Species Act.
sentences.cn: 荒野协会游说国会批准《濒危物种法》。
